transcript: I am a rilliter and this is my business, I keep people calling me all the time. There's no other end, I don't have a landline, I can't afford to have a landline.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I am a realtor and this is my business.  People are calling me all the time but you know, and I don't have a land line.  I can't afford to have a land line
